About the Company: SKF India Ltd is a leading global supplier of rolling bearing and seals. The company provides products, solutions and services in the areas of rolling bearings, seals, mechatronics, services and lubrications systems. The company manufactures different types of bearings, seals including roller bearings, bearing units, housings, industrial & hydraulic seals, linear motion products, high precision bearing, spindles, electrical actuators, actuation systems and rolling bearing steel which are used in cars and truck wheels.The companys business is divided into four groups:Automotive business unit,Electrical business unit,Industrial business unit and Service business unit.
